source.author: Raulings, E.J.
source.title: Stylidiaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Raulings, E.J. (1999). Stylidiaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Column non-motile, erect, enclosed by a sensitive, hood-shaped labellum prior to anthesis; plants always ephemeral
Column motile and folded (not in S. beaugleholei), the labellum small and narrow; plants ephemeral or perennial
